title: Soul Reaver Draven Axe Bug
body:
This seems to only happen on Soul Reaver Draven for me, whenever I auto with Q the axe is invisible when hitting the enemy and when coming back and Stand Aside is invisible as well. Rito please fix this. 
{{sticker:galio-happy}}

replies.body: Yep, please fix it, its the only skin I have for him.
